ing: 3 tablespoons safflower oil, or more as needed
1 (1x4 inch) piece kombu seaweed (such as Emerald CoveÂ®) (optional)
1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, or more to taste
des: "Copycat recipe for Roots lima bean hummus in Asheville, NC!"
ins: Combine safflower oil, tahini, lemon juice, vinegar, tamari, cumin, salt, black pepper, garlic, kombu, and cayenne pepper in a blender or food processor; blend until smooth. Add lima beans and blend until smooth, adding more oil  as desired. Add parsley and pulse just until mixed.
